channel.title: Comments on: Dynamically Create Dummy Images At Any Size

item.title: By: The History Of Dummyimage.com » Coding, Dummyimage.com » Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: The History Of Dummyimage.com » Coding, Dummyimage.com » Russell Heimlich
item.description: [...] quite comfortable with JavaScript however and found PHP easy to pickup. On August 26th, 2007, I had launched my first version of dummyimage.com.The first release was as simple as could be. The only thing you could change were the dimensions of [...]

item.title: By: Graham Armfield
item.dc:creator: Graham Armfield
item.description: A bit on the late side spotting this, but what a great little tool. Thanks for sharing it with us.
item.content:encoded: A bit on the late side spotting this, but what a great little tool. Thanks for sharing it with us.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Sure go for it. The source code is there for the taking though it is in PHP. Should be fairly straightforward but let me know if you have any questions. http://www.russellheimlich.com/contact
item.content:encoded: Sure go for it. The source code is there for the taking though it is in PHP. Should be fairly straightforward but let me know if you have any questions. http://www.russellheimlich.com/contact

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: Hehe yeah i know, thats a great idea with the / dimensions. Would you mind if i borowed the idea and implemeted it on my own site ?
item.content:encoded: Hehe yeah i know, thats a great idea with the / dimensions. Would you mind if i borowed the idea and implemeted it on my own site ?

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.content:encoded:
Yea but you can’t change your image from a url… IE http://dummyimage.com/400×600 and http://dummyimage.com/100×900

I made this to avoid having to gernate images, save them, and upload them somewhere when doing mockups. I’ve got more ideas for this tool but no time to implement them yet.

Nice ideas with the styles!

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: Huh!.. i just found your site. I created a random image generator myself for exactly the same reason, for helping me in web development. Feel free to check it out at rndimg.com
item.content:encoded: Huh!.. i just found your site. I created a random image generator myself for exactly the same reason, for helping me in web development. Feel free to check it out at rndimg.com

item.title: By: ToddZ
item.dc:creator: ToddZ
item.description: Hey, what a neat little tool. I hadn't ever wished for something like this but it might be one of those things you don't know you need until you see it.
